alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 2:19PM EDT until September 07 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LACKAWANNA AND NORTHEASTERN LUZERNE COUNTIES... At 219 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bear Creek, or near Wilkes-Barre, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moosic, Bear Creek, Dupont, Laflin, Laurel Run, Bear Creek Village, Glendale, Forest Park, Westminister, and Wilkes-Barre Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
